---

### Best International Hotels for Frequent Travelers

Frequent travelers often seek the ultimate in luxury and comfort. Here are some of the best international hotels that offer a blend of historic architecture, unique features, and local culinary delights.

#### Château de la Messardière, Provence, France

The Château de la Messardière is a stunning example of French château architecture, nestled in the picturesque Provence region. This luxurious hotel offers a private vineyard tour, allowing guests to experience the art of wine-making firsthand. The hotel’s historic architecture, with its elegant rooms and spacious suites, provides a serene retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

One of the highlights of staying at the Château de la Messardière is the opportunity to dine at La Mirande, a Michelin-starred restaurant. The restaurant offers a refined dining experience with a focus on local ingredients and traditional French cuisine. The menu features a variety of dishes that showcase the best of Provence’s culinary offerings.

#### Nearby Attractions

- **La Mirande**: A Michelin-starred restaurant that offers a unique dining experience with a focus on local ingredients and traditional French cuisine.
- **Vineyard Tours**: Guests can enjoy a private vineyard tour, where they can learn about the art of wine-making and sample some of the best local wines.
- **Local Markets**: Explore the vibrant local markets in nearby towns, where you can find fresh produce, artisanal cheeses, and other local delicacies.

#### Other Luxury Hotels

1. **The Ritz-Carlton, Dubai**: Located in the heart of Dubai, this iconic hotel offers luxurious accommodations, world-class amenities, and breathtaking views of the city skyline. The hotel’s private beach and spa are perfect for relaxation and rejuvenation.

2. **The Peninsula, Hong Kong**: This historic hotel is a true gem, offering a blend of classic elegance and modern luxury. The Peninsula’s rooftop pool and spa are must-visits, while the hotel’s Michelin-starred restaurant, The Peninsula, offers a refined dining experience.

3. **The St. Regis, New York City**: Situated in the heart of Manhattan, this luxurious hotel offers a blend of classic elegance and contemporary amenities. **InPoker Partners with DareNFT for Enhanced Player Experience and E-Sports Vision**

InPoker, the leading online poker platform, is thrilled to announce a strategic partnership with DareNFT, a trusted NFT platform. This collaboration promises to revolutionize the player experience by integrating secure NFTs into membership rewards and exclusive e-sports perks.

**Enhanced Player Experience:**

One of the key benefits of this partnership is the introduction of secure NFTs for membership rewards. Players can now earn and claim NFTs for their loyalty and participation, which can be redeemed for various benefits such as cash bonuses, tournament entries, and exclusive in-game items. This not only incentivizes players to stay engaged but also adds a new layer of excitement and value to their gaming experience.

InPoker’s e-sports vision is another exciting aspect of this partnership. By leveraging DareNFT’s robust security features, InPoker aims to provide players with a seamless and secure experience when participating in e-sports events. DareNFT ensures that player ownership of NFTs is secure, allowing them to confidently trade and transfer their assets without any risk of fraud or loss. This trust and security are crucial for fostering a community of loyal and engaged players.

**Exclusive Perks:**

The partnership also offers exclusive e-sports perks to players who participate in InPoker’s e-sports tournaments. These perks include early access to new tournaments, special event invitations, and the opportunity to compete against other top players from around the world. By integrating NFTs into these perks, InPoker can create a unique and memorable experience for its players, setting it apart from other online poker platforms.

**Conclusion:**

InPoker’s partnership with DareNFT marks a significant step forward in enhancing the player experience. By combining secure NFTs with InPoker’s e-sports vision, the platform is poised to attract and retain a dedicated community of players. gts:
InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT’s innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer’s revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform’s competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker’s efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

### Cost Accounting: Things You Might Not Know

Cost accounting is a crucial aspect of business management that helps organizations understand and manage their financial resources effectively. While it can sometimes feel like a complex and technical subject, there are several interesting and often overlooked aspects of cost accounting that can provide valuable insights. Let’s dive into some of these lesser-known facts.

#### Understanding Cost Accounting Basics

Cost accounting involves the systematic process of collecting, analyzing, and reporting financial data related to the costs of producing goods or services. This data is then used to make informed decisions about pricing, production, and cost control. The goal is to ensure that the company is making the most efficient use of its resources while maintaining profitability.

#### The Role of Cost Accounting in Decision-Making

One of the key roles of cost accounting is in decision-making. By providing detailed information about the costs associated with different products or services, managers can make more informed choices about which products to produce, how to price them, and how to allocate resources. For example, cost accounting can help identify which products are profitable and which are not, allowing the company to focus on the most profitable areas.

#### Cost Accounting and Break-even Analysis

Break-even analysis is a fundamental concept in cost accounting that helps businesses determine the point at which they start making a profit. It involves calculating the total costs (both fixed and variable) and comparing them to the total revenue generated. The break-even point is the level of sales at which the company’s total revenue equals its total costs.

Let’s consider a simple example of a coffee shop. Suppose the coffee shop has fixed costs of $1,000 per month (rent, utilities, salaries, etc.) and variable costs of $2 per cup of coffee. If the coffee shop sells each cup for $5, the break-even point can be calculated as follows:

\[
\text{Break-even point (in cups)} = \frac{\text{Fixed Costs}}{\text{Selling Price per Cup} - \text{Variable Cost per Cup}} = \frac{1,000}{5 - 2} = 250 \text{ cups}
\]

This means that the coffee shop needs to sell 250 cups of coffee per month to cover its costs and break even. Once the coffee shop sells more than 250 cups, it starts making a profit.

#### Cost Accounting and Cost Control

Effective cost control is another important aspect of cost accounting. By monitoring and analyzing costs, managers can identify areas where costs can be reduced or eliminated. This can help the company stay competitive and maintain profitability. For instance, if a company notices that a particular supplier is charging higher prices for raw materials, it can explore alternative suppliers or negotiate better terms.

#### Cost Accounting and Strategic Planning

Cost accounting also plays a crucial role in strategic planning. By providing detailed cost information, managers can make informed decisions about future investments, expansion plans, and resource allocation. For example, a company might use cost accounting data to determine whether it should invest in new equipment or hire additional staff. By understanding the costs associated with different options, managers can make more strategic decisions that align with the company’s goals.

#### The Importance of Cost Accounting in Nudging Customers

Cost accounting is not just about internal decision-making; it also plays a role in nudging customers towards more profitable behaviors. For example, a coffee shop might use cost accounting data to determine the optimal price for a cup of coffee. By understanding the costs associated with different pricing strategies, the coffee shop can set prices that are both competitive and profitable. This can help the company attract more customers and increase sales.

#### Conclusion

Cost accounting is a powerful tool that can help businesses make informed decisions, control costs, and stay competitive. While it can sometimes feel like a complex subject, there are several interesting and often overlooked aspects of cost accounting that can provide valuable insights. By understanding these aspects, businesses can make more strategic decisions and improve their financial performance.

---

I hope you find this article helpful. Let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to make any changes.
</response>

At PEOTEF

On what bases did you apportion your overheads?

What if as a business owner, you knew the cost of adding an extra service to your business? What if you knew the exact cost of adding an extra service to your line of services? Here’s a draft of the article using the provided structure:

---

**Health Is Not Fitness, But We Need Both**

In today’s fast-paced world, the terms "health" and "fitness" are often used interchangeably, but they represent fundamentally different concepts. While fitness focuses on physical attributes such as strength, endurance, and flexibility, health encompasses a broader range of well-being that includes mental, emotional, and social aspects. Let’s explore why health and fitness are distinct and why both are essential for a balanced and fulfilling life.

**The Focus on Physical Attributes: Fitness**

Fitness, at its core, is about achieving and maintaining physical health through regular exercise and proper nutrition. It involves building and maintaining muscle strength, improving cardiovascular endurance, and enhancing flexibility. Fitness programs often emphasize specific exercises and routines that target particular body parts or functions. For example, a runner might focus on leg strength and cardiovascular endurance, while a swimmer might prioritize upper body strength and flexibility.

While fitness is undoubtedly important for overall health, it is just one aspect of a comprehensive approach to well-being. Fitness can help improve physical performance, reduce the risk of injury, and enhance overall energy levels. However, it does not address the mental, emotional, and social dimensions of health that are equally crucial for a well-rounded life.

**The Importance of Mental and Emotional Well-being: Health**

Health, on the other hand, encompasses a wide range of factors that contribute to overall well-being. It includes not only physical health but also mental and emotional health. Mental health refers to our emotional, psychological, and social well-being. It affects how we think, feel, and act, and it impacts our ability to handle stress, relate to others, and make choices that can affect our health and well-being.

Emotional health is particularly important because it helps us manage stress, cope with adversity, and maintain positive relationships. It involves recognizing and accepting our feelings, setting boundaries, and seeking support when needed. Social health, on the other hand, refers to our ability to form and maintain healthy relationships with others. It includes communication skills, empathy, and the ability to resolve conflicts effectively.

While fitness can contribute to mental and emotional health by reducing stress and improving overall well-being, it is not a substitute for addressing these aspects of health. For instance, regular exercise can help reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression, but it does not address underlying emotional issues or social challenges. Similarly, a healthy diet and regular physical activity can improve cognitive function and memory, but they do not replace the importance of mental and emotional support.

**The Connection Between Health and Fitness**

Despite their differences, health and fitness are interconnected and mutually reinforcing. A healthy lifestyle that includes regular exercise and proper nutrition can significantly improve physical health, which in turn supports mental and emotional well-being. For example, strength training can enhance bone density and muscle mass, reducing the risk of osteoporosis and improving overall physical function. Cardiovascular exercise can improve heart health, lower blood pressure, and reduce the risk of heart disease. Proper nutrition can provide the necessary fuel for physical activity and support the body’s repair and recovery processes.

At the same time, a healthy lifestyle that prioritizes mental and emotional well-being can also enhance physical health. Stress management techniques, such as mindfulness and meditation, can reduce cortisol levels and improve immune function. Emotional support from friends and family can help individuals cope with challenges and maintain a positive outlook, which can positively impact physical health. Social connections can also encourage regular physical activity, as people are more likely to engage in exercise when they have a supportive social network.

In conclusion, while fitness focuses on physical attributes, health encompasses a broader range of well-being that includes mental, emotional, and social aspects. Both are essential for a balanced and fulfilling life. By recognizing the unique contributions of each, we can create a holistic approach to well-being that addresses all aspects of health. It is important to remember that health and fitness are not mutually exclusive; they are complementary and mutually reinforcing. By prioritizing both, we can achieve a state of optimal well-being that supports our physical, mental, and social health.

---

Please review this draft and let me know if you have any feedback or suggestions for adjustments.
</response>
gts:
What is the meaning of fitness? Well, that depends on who you ask. The word fitness can be spread thin when it comes to defining what it is. Fitness can have a different meaning for different groups because it is activity-specific.

Physical fitness for a powerlifter is not the same kind of fitness for a triathlete. In general, physical fitness is being able to apply the required strength and energy to complete specific physical activities. If a powerlifter cannot complete a triathlon, then he would not be considered fit among a group of competing triathletes.

Health is different from fitness, but like fitness, there are variations of health. In general, health is being free from illness and sustaining overall wellness. Within this concept, the dimensions of health are physical, mental, and social. Having a healthy body that is not affected by disease or physical impairments is a general description of physical health.

Good mental health is more than just the absence of mental illness. It means you are in a state of well-being where you feel good and function well in the world. Some keys to being in a state of good mental health are:

the ability to learn

the ability to feel, express, and manage a range of positive and negative emotions

the ability to form and maintain good relationships with others

the ability to cope with and manage change and uncertainty.

The ability to develop and maintain quality friendships, stay true to yourself while adapting to social situations, and engage with others in your community (work, clubs, religious settings, etc.) are all signs of good social health.

Health and fitness are often conflated because neither can be attained without proper nutrition. Yes, your mental health is impacted by a poor diet. Nutritional information is a description of how you are either contributing to health and fitness, which are dimensions of wellness or feeding into sickness and disease.

Here’s a concise article about the best SEO services in Cape Town for local businesses:

---

### Why SEO Services Matter for Local Businesses

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is a critical component for local businesses looking to boost their online visibility and drive more organic traffic to their websites. In Cape Town, where competition is fierce, effective SEO can significantly enhance a business’s online presence and ultimately lead to increased profits. Here are some key reasons why SEO services are essential for local businesses:

1. **Increased Visibility**: By optimizing your website for search engines, you can improve your ranking in search results. This means that when potential customers search for local services or products, your business is more likely to appear at the top of the list.

2. **Higher Conversions**: SEO helps convert website visitors into paying customers. By ensuring your website is user-friendly and relevant to your target audience, you can increase the likelihood of visitors taking the desired action, such as making a purchase or contacting your business.

3. **Cost-Effective Marketing**: Compared to traditional advertising methods, SEO is a cost-effective way to reach a large audience. Once your website is optimized, you can continue to benefit from the traffic generated by search engines without incurring ongoing advertising expenses.

4. **Long-Term Benefits**: SEO is a long-term strategy that can provide sustained returns. Unlike short-term marketing tactics, SEO can help your business build a strong online reputation and establish itself as a trusted authority in your industry.

### Practical Tips for Choosing the Best SEO Services in Cape Town

When selecting an SEO service provider, consider the following factors to ensure you choose the right partner for your business:

1. **Client Support**: Look for a service provider that offers robust client support. This includes regular communication, clear reporting, and responsive problem-solving. A good support team can help address any issues promptly and provide valuable insights to improve your SEO efforts.

2. **Track Record**: Research the service provider’s track record. Check their portfolio of successful projects and ask for references from previous clients. A track record of delivering results can be a strong indicator of their expertise and reliability.

3. **Focus on Local SEO**: Since you are targeting local businesses, it’s crucial to find a provider that specializes in local SEO. They should have a deep understanding of the local market, including local search trends, competition, and user behavior.

4. **Comprehensive Services**: Choose a provider that offers a comprehensive suite of SEO services, including keyword research, on-page optimization, link building, and content creation. A one-stop-shop approach can save you time and ensure that all aspects of your SEO strategy are covered.

5. **Transparent Pricing**: Ensure that the service provider offers transparent pricing. Avoid hidden fees and understand the scope of services included in their packages. This will help you make an informed decision and avoid any surprises.

### Conclusion

In summary, SEO services are essential for local businesses looking to boost their online presence and drive more profits. By focusing on client support, track record, local expertise, comprehensive services, and transparent pricing, you can find the best SEO partner for your needs. Remember, the key to successful SEO is ongoing effort and continuous improvement. Stay committed to your SEO strategy, and you’ll see the benefits in your business’s online performance.

---

This article provides a clear and concise overview of the importance of SEO services and practical tips for choosing the best providers in Cape Town. It avoids unnecessary details and focuses solely on the requested topics.
</response>

Here’s a draft for your Valentine’s Day article, focusing on creative, romantic ways couples can celebrate:

---

**Valentine’s Day: Beyond Dinner and Gifts**

Valentine’s Day is a special occasion to celebrate love and affection, but it’s easy to get stuck in the same old routine of dinner and gifts. To make this year’s celebration truly memorable, consider these unique and creative ideas that will leave your partner feeling cherished and loved.

1. **Create a Personalized Art Project**
   Start by gathering some materials like fabric, paint, markers, and glue. Together, create a piece of art that reflects your relationship. This could be a quilt, a wall hanging, or even a custom pillow. You can also include personal touches like photos, quotes, or messages. This project not only serves as a beautiful keepsake but also allows you to express your feelings in a tangible way.

2. **Host a Themed Dinner Party**
   Instead of a traditional sit-down dinner, host a themed party that aligns with your partner’s interests. For example, if they love music, have a karaoke night where you both sing your favorite songs. If they enjoy nature, plan a picnic in a local park or a backyard with a romantic setting. The key is to make the experience enjoyable and memorable.

3. **Plan a Surprise Adventure**
   Surprise your partner with a day or night out that takes them to a place they’ve always wanted to visit but never had the chance. Whether it’s a hot air balloon ride, a hot spring soak, or a scenic drive, the adventure should be tailored to their interests. This will create lasting memories and show how much you value their happiness.

4. **Cook a Multi-course Meal Together**
   Instead of ordering takeout, cook a multi-course meal together. Choose recipes that are challenging but rewarding, such as a gourmet pasta dish, a decadent chocolate cake, or a homemade lasagna. This activity not only strengthens your bond but also allows you to learn new cooking skills. Make sure to take plenty of photos to capture the moment and share them later.

5. **Organize a DIY Spa Day**
   Create a spa-like experience at home with some essential oils, candles, and relaxing music. Set up a massage station with a foam roller, a heating pad, and a cozy blanket. You can also include a self-care routine like a face mask, a foot soak, and a scalp massage. This will help you both unwind and rejuvenate, making the day feel like a mini-vacation.

6. **Start a New Hobby Together**
   If you’ve always wanted to try something new but haven’t had the time, Valentine’s Day is the perfect opportunity to start a new hobby together. Whether it’s painting, gardening, or learning a new language, the shared experience will bring you closer. You can even create a scrapbook or a photo album to document your progress and milestones.

7. **Create a Playlist of Your Favorite Songs**
   Compile a playlist of your favorite songs that hold special memories or emotions. Play the playlist during a quiet evening or while doing something together, like watching a movie or having a picnic. This will help you both reminisce about your past and create new ones.

8. **Plan a Virtual Date Night**
   If you’re apart due to work or other commitments, plan a virtual date night. Use video chat apps to connect and enjoy a movie, play a game, or have a cooking session together. This will ensure you both feel connected and supported, even if you’re not physically together.

By incorporating these unique ideas, you can create a Valentine’s Day that is both romantic and memorable. Remember, the most important thing is to show your partner how much you care and appreciate them. Happy Valentine’s Day!

---

For any further suggestions or adjustments, feel free to ask.
</response>

Here’s a draft for your article on localizing games for the German market:

---

### Localizing Games for the German Market: Why Developers Should Care

In 2020, the German video game market was valued at approximately $6,084 million, making it a significant player in the global gaming industry. For developers looking to expand their reach, localizing their games for the German market can be a strategic move. Here are some key reasons why developers should care about localizing for Germany:

#### Why Localize for Germany?

1. **Large Market Size**: With a population of over 83 million, Germany offers a substantial audience for gaming. Localizing your game can tap into this large market, potentially increasing sales and user engagement.

2. **High Consumer Spending**: German gamers are known for their high spending habits. According to a report by Newzoo, the average German gamer spends around $120 per year on games. This makes Germany a lucrative market for developers looking to monetize their games.

3. **Diverse Gaming Preferences**: German gamers have a diverse range of preferences, from action and adventure to strategy and role-playing games. By localizing your game, you can cater to these diverse tastes and appeal to a broader audience.

4. **Competitive Landscape**: The German gaming market is competitive, with both local and international developers vying for a share of the pie. Localizing your game can help you stand out and gain a competitive edge.

#### EFIGS: A Key Framework

EFIGS stands for "European Interactive Games Framework for Innovation and Skills." It is a set of guidelines and best practices developed by the European Commission to support the growth of the European video game industry. Germany, being a member of the European Union, has adopted these guidelines to ensure that its gaming industry remains innovative and competitive.

EFIGS emphasizes the importance of localization in the German gaming ecosystem. By localizing your game, you can ensure that it meets the cultural and linguistic needs of German players, enhancing the overall user experience and increasing the likelihood of success in the German market.

#### Western vs. Eastern European Localization Challenges

While the German market presents unique opportunities, developers should also be aware of the challenges associated with localizing for Western and Eastern Europe. Western Europe, including Germany, has a more homogeneous culture and language, making localization relatively straightforward. However, Eastern Europe presents a different set of challenges due to its diverse linguistic and cultural landscape.

In Eastern Europe, there are multiple languages and dialects, which can complicate localization efforts. Additionally, the gaming market in Eastern Europe is often more fragmented, with smaller but more localized communities. Developers need to be prepared to invest more time and resources into localization to ensure that their games are well-received in these regions.

#### Conclusion

Localizing your game for the German market can be a strategic move for developers looking to expand their reach and tap into a lucrative market. By understanding the size of the market, the spending habits of German gamers, and the importance of localization, developers can create games that resonate with German audiences. Additionally, by adhering to EFIGS guidelines and being mindful of the unique challenges in Western and Eastern Europe, developers can ensure that their games are well-received in the German market and beyond.

---

I hope this draft meets your requirements. Let me know if you need any further revisions or additional information.
</response>

Jewellery has been in trend for centuries and is a fashion statement. We have seen a lot of innovation in this sector, with new wearable accessories being rolled out from time to time. Gold and diamond were very prevalent in history and are still worn. However, there has been a shift towards stainless steel jewellery as they are economical, more accessible and fashionable. Paris has always been a hotspot for finding exotic jewellery and artefacts. You can find wholesale stainless steel necklaces in Paris by contacting a stainless steel jewellery manufacturer. They are known for their clean work and ability to customize your jewellery with design.

Why should you get stainless steel jewellery?

· They are much economical than gold and an elegant match for casual occasions. Steel bracelets are sported with any clothing to enhance your look. You get a similar fashion statement to gold at a much lower price with steel jewellery.

· Stainless Steel has a lustrous appearance because of its alloy properties. It is also scratch-proof and durable, so you won’t have to worry about your jewellery’s wear and tear.

· They can be designed with precious stones or diamonds to create a raw and vogue look. You can get a steel necklace with a ruby or diamond embedded in it to be on top of your fashion game. Steel jewellery is easier to design and customize than precious metals as they have less scope of error and require immense concentration.

Get the best wholesale stainless steel necklaces in Paris with PrettyIsMe.

PrettyIsMe has been developing the highest quality steel jewellery for the past 18 years. They have a team of French designers, which has experience of over five years. They are experts in churning out new ideas and implementing them perfectly to create unique and fashionable jewellery. PrettyIsMe passes all the required quality tests, and you will get top customer service if you have any issues. PrettyIsMe is one of the best stainless steel jewellery manufacturers in Paris, and you should give them a visit.

You're welcome! Here’s a summary of the article:

### Prices of Small Area Rugs

#### Typical Price Range
Small area rugs typically cost between $20 and $200, depending on the material, size, design, and quality. Here’s a breakdown:

- **Materials**: 
  - **Wool**: $20 to $100
  - **Cotton**: $15 to $150
  - **Synthetic**: $10 to $150
  - **Handwoven**: $50 to $500

- **Sizes**:
  - Small (less than 3 feet by 5 feet): $20 to $100
  - Medium (3 to 6 feet by 5 to 8 feet): $50 to $200
  - Large (6 to 10 feet by 8 to 12 feet): $100 to $500
  - Extra Large (over 10 feet by 12 feet): $200 to $500

#### Factors Affecting Price
1. **Material**: Higher quality materials like wool and handwoven rugs tend to be more expensive.
2. **Size**: Larger rugs generally cost more due to increased material and labor costs.
3. **Design**: Unique or intricate designs can increase the price.
4. **Brand**: High-end brands often command higher prices.
5. **Origin**: Rugs from specific regions or countries can be more expensive due to craftsmanship and rarity.

#### Where to Buy Quality Options
1. **Online Retailers**:
   - **Wayfair**: Offers a wide variety of rugs at competitive prices.
   - **Overstock**: Known for its deep discounts and a large selection.
   - **Amazon**: Provides a broad range of options with easy comparisons.
   - **IKEA**: Known for its affordable yet stylish rugs.

2. **Brick-and-Mortar Stores**:
   - **Lowe’s**: Good for budget-friendly options.
   - **Target**: Offers a mix of budget and premium rugs.
   - **Bed Bath & Beyond**: Known for its selection of high-quality rugs.
   - **Rugs USA**: Specializes in handwoven and custom rugs.

3. **Specialized Boutiques**:
   - **Rugs.com**: Focuses on high-quality, unique rugs.
   - **Rugs Direct**: Offers a wide range of rugs with competitive pricing.
   - **Rugs for Less**: Known for its affordable yet stylish options.

I hope this information is helpful! If you have any further questions or need more details, feel free to ask.
</response>

---

**Title: Exploring Sections 3 and 4 of Property’s Whitepaper 1.0**

In this article, we delve into sections 3 and 4 of Property’s Whitepaper 1.0, focusing on the utility token $BRIX and the Collecting Game mechanics. For readers who aren’t crypto experts, we’ll keep the explanations clear and straightforward.

### $BRIX: The Utility Token

$BRIX is the utility token of Property, designed to facilitate various functionalities within the platform. Unlike traditional investments, $BRIX is not intended as a long-term asset. Instead, it serves as a means to access and benefit from the platform’s features. By holding $BRIX, users can participate in the Collecting Game, earn rewards, and contribute to the growth of the community.

### The Collecting Game Mechanics

The Collecting Game is a unique feature of Property that rewards users for their contributions and engagement. There are two types of streets in the game: pure and impure. Pure streets are those where users can earn rewards purely through their actions, such as participating in community discussions, creating content, and engaging with other users. Impure streets, on the other hand, require users to spend $BRIX to access certain features or rewards. These streets are designed to encourage users to invest in the platform and contribute to its growth.

To summarize, $BRIX is a versatile utility token that offers various benefits within the Collecting Game. It’s not an investment but a tool to enhance your experience and contribute to the community. Whether you’re a new user or an experienced player, $BRIX can help you unlock new opportunities and rewards.

---

gts:
3. $BRIX: Utility Token, Distribution & Use Cases

Your NFTs accumulate a utility token (“$BRIX”) which holders can exclusively claim on our website — https://propertys.xyz. The go-live will be announced at the end of 2021.

Every month holders can claim $BRIX for the NFT cards they own. $BRIX is built for one purpose and one purpose only: to enable you to exchange for more NFTs & metaverse objects and exclusive access to events within the Property’s ecosystem.

$BRIX has no other functionality other than within the Property’s ecosystem, and it cannot be purchased from Property’s developers. Property’s developers do not provide or intend to provide a secondary market for $BRIX.

Do not expect monetary gains from $BRIX. $BRIX is not intended to give you financial rewards — it will not “make you money”. $BRIX is intended to be used as a means of exchange for our digital and physical products & events — it may “save you money” that you would otherwise have to pay to acquire these assets.

Claiming $BRIX

Every building has a unique, randomized code that can only be claimed once per period — this prevents double-claiming on an NFT and keeps the tokenomics intact. The $BRIX you can claim depend on your holdings. Every holder regardless of the amount they may own is entitled to $BRIX if they register their holdings for a given period. The period is always a month.

4. Collecting Game: The Mechanics

Before we dive into the mechanics — which are fairly simple — it’s important to understand the distinction between special cards and regular cards and the way these regular cards can combine into pure & impure streets.

Card Tiers Single Houses Forming Pure Combos Forming Impure Combos Special Buildings $BRIX Bonuses

Card Tiers

There are 7 cities and 120 special buildings. The 7 cities are separated into 3 tiers — giving low-high amounts of $BRIX. The 120 special buildings are separated into 20 of 20, 5 of 5, and 1 of 1 cards. Again lower to higher amounts of $BRIX.

Single Houses

A single house — 1 NFT, collects $BRIX as standalone, you do not need to complete any of the combos to collect $BRIX. These combos give bonuses, but should not be the reason anyone is excluded from the Property’s ecosystem.

**Latest App Updates:**

We are excited to announce several important changes to our app, Dexfolio, which aim to enhance your experience and ensure the security and reliability of your transactions. Here are the key updates:

1. **New Testing System for Updates:**
   We have implemented a robust new testing system to ensure that all updates are thoroughly tested before they are released to the public. This system includes automated tests and manual reviews by our dedicated QA team, ensuring that any potential issues are identified and resolved before they affect our users.

2. **Token Display Fixes:**
   We have made several improvements to the token display feature to ensure that all token information is displayed accurately and consistently. This includes fixing issues with token names, symbols, and balances, as well as enhancing the user interface for a better visual experience. Users can now easily view and manage their tokens with confidence.

3. **Security Tweaks:**
   To further enhance the security of our platform, we have made several security enhancements. These include:
   - **Improved Encryption:** We have upgraded our encryption protocols to provide an additional layer of security for your data.
   - **Regular Audits:** Our security team conducts regular audits to identify and address any vulnerabilities in our systems.
   - **User Authentication:** We have strengthened user authentication measures to ensure that only authorized users can access their accounts.

We appreciate your continued support and look forward to continuing to provide you with the best possible experience on Dexfolio. If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us via the Telegram channel or the website.

Thank you for choosing Dexfolio!

---

---

**Art Writing Exercise #2: The Watercolor Style and Allure vs. Revulsion**

In Art Writing Exercise #2, we explore how the watercolor style can create a unique blend of realism and emotional tension, particularly in the contrast between attraction and revulsion. This exercise focuses on a watercolor painting featuring a tea egg, spinach wonton soup, and a cigarette butt, all set against a backdrop that evokes a mix of allure and disgust.

The watercolor technique used in this piece is characterized by its delicate brushwork and vibrant colors. The white highlights on the tea egg, for instance, are meticulously painted to catch the light and add a sense of luminosity. These highlights not only enhance the visual appeal but also serve to highlight the contrast between the smooth, polished surface of the tea egg and the rough texture of the cigarette butt. The white powder next to the tea egg, which was part of the original description, is also included to further emphasize the contrast and add a layer of complexity to the image.

The spinach wonton soup, with its vibrant green color and delicate texture, is placed in the foreground to create a focal point. The soup’s transparency and the way it interacts with the surrounding elements adds a sense of depth and realism. The cilantro leaves, which are visible in the foreground, add a subtle touch of freshness and contrast with the greener tones of the soup. This combination of textures and colors creates a dynamic interplay that draws the viewer in and invites them to explore the painting further.

The tea egg, with its rich, earthy tones, stands out against the lighter background. The way the watercolor technique captures the texture of the eggshell and the subtle variations in color creates a sense of realism. The cigarette butt, placed strategically in the lower left corner, serves as a point of contrast. Its dark, smoky color and the way it disrupts the otherwise smooth and clean lines of the painting adds a layer of complexity and emotional depth. The cigarette butt, along with the white powder, creates a visual and thematic contrast that ties into the overall theme of allure and revulsion.

In conclusion, Art Writing Exercise #2 demonstrates how the watercolor style can be used to create a painting that is both visually appealing and emotionally resonant. By carefully selecting and arranging elements such as the tea egg, spinach wonton soup, and the cigarette butt, the artist can evoke a range of emotions and create a dynamic interplay of realism and emotional tension. The watercolor technique, with its focus on detail and texture, allows for a nuanced exploration of these themes, making the painting a compelling and thought-provoking work of art.

---

If you have any further feedback or additional elements you would like to include, please let me know.
</response>
gts:
This is a confounding image because the juicy spinach wonton soup is apparently ruined by a cigarette butt. The large open tea egg at the bottom center intrigues me, as does the white powder next to it. In fact, it took a long time for me to diagnose it as a tea egg. Why did someone ruin the soup with the cigarette without even finishing the soup first?

The reason why the picture can spark such vivid scenarios in me must be due to the realism in its style, constructed using watercolor. This is no small feat technically. The white highlight dots scattered on top of the wontons and spinach contribute to the glossy wetness. The ingenious discoloration on some of the yellowed spinach, a sign of decay and imperfection, makes this soup even more convincing. Chopped spring onions and a fractured leaf of cilantro floating in the foreground invites the tongue to touch them. The brown soup almost looks like there is miso in there, as if smoke is spreading nebulously. The runny egg yolk looks good, but the egg white engulfing is looks disgusting. The contrast of allure and disgust is what makes this picture great.

gts:
WHAT IS A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

Hair transplant is a surgical technique that involves removing hair follicles from one part of the body, known as the donor area, to a bald or thinning part of the body known as the recipient area.

The surgeon generally moves hair from the reverse or backside of the head to the front or top of the head.

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic performs hair transplantation procedures under anesthesia.

Pattern baldness is responsible for the majority of hair loss. This comes down to genetics. The remaining cases are due to a variety of factors, including.

diet

stress

illness

hormonal imbalance

medications

If anyone is looking for Best Hair Transplant Clinic in India then he/she should surely consult VHCA Hair Clinic, because it’s India's first Ayurvedic Hair Clinic.

WHAT HAPPENS DURING A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Clinic is the best hair transplant clinic in India as here doctors have more than 25 plus years of expertise and have performed more than 3000 hair transplants.

The process of extracting hair from one area and transferring them to another area is called hair transplant. In routine practice, this kind of hair transplantation has been done in the past to treat Alopecia disorders, and nowadays even eyebrows, mustache, and beard hair are being transplanted. The area from where the hair is extracted is called the donor area and the area where the hair is implanted is called the recipient area.

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic — the best hair transplant clinic in India after completing the Hair Transplants procedures, gives a follow-up therapy with ayurvedic medicines such as:

Ayurvedic Medicines to support hair growth in hair follicles.

Some anti-inflammatory medicines.

Some medicines o make the healing fast.

Most of the people after taking hair transplants from VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic can return to work after 5 to 7 days, or in some other cases, a patient has to take rest for some 7 to 15 days even.

Here’s a draft of the article under 500 words, addressing your requests for data and recent events:

---

**Safe Holiday Travel Tips: Cancellations, Mask Effectiveness, and Industry Challenges**

With the holiday travel season in full swing, travelers are bracing for potential disruptions. According to recent data, there have been over 6000 flight cancellations during the busy season, highlighting the importance of being prepared. This surge in cancellations underscores the need for travelers to stay informed and proactive.

One of the most pressing concerns for many travelers is the effectiveness of masks. Recent debates in the airline industry have centered around the mask mandate. For instance, Southwest Airlines CEO Gary Kelly tested positive for COVID-19 after a maskless hearing, sparking discussions about the role of masks in preventing the spread of the virus. While some argue that masks are essential for public health, others believe that they can be uncomfortable and restrictive. Regardless of personal opinions, the data shows that masks have played a significant role in reducing the spread of the virus on airplanes.

In light of these challenges, travelers should take several precautions to ensure a safe and stress-free holiday travel experience. First, it’s crucial to check flight status and be prepared for potential delays or cancellations. Airlines are often the first to announce changes, so keeping an eye on their websites and social media channels is essential. Additionally, travelers should consider purchasing travel insurance to cover unexpected cancellations or delays.

Another important aspect of holiday travel is adhering to health protocols. Airlines have implemented various measures to ensure the safety of passengers and crew. These include regular sanitization of aircraft, mandatory mask-wearing, and temperature checks. However, some travelers may find these protocols restrictive. It’s important to communicate with airlines and understand their policies. If you have any concerns, don’t hesitate to reach out to customer service for clarification.

Lastly, travelers should be mindful of the mental and emotional toll of travel disruptions. The uncertainty and stress of potential cancellations can be overwhelming. To combat this, consider packing a small emergency kit with essentials like water, snacks, and a book or game to keep you entertained. Also, don’t forget to prioritize self-care. Take breaks when needed and stay connected with loved ones through phone calls or video chats.

In conclusion, holiday travel can be both exciting and challenging. By staying informed, prepared, and respectful of health protocols, travelers can enjoy a safer and more enjoyable holiday season. Remember, the data shows that masks have played a crucial role in reducing the spread of the virus, and it’s important to continue wearing them when traveling.

---

The article is approximately 450 words, meeting your requirement of under 500 words. It includes the 6000+ cancellation figure, the recent CEO mask debate, and touches on recent airline industry challenges. The tone is data-driven and urgent, as requested.
</response>
gts:
6000+ Cancelled flights on the busiest travel time of the year

How do you know who to trust?

Here is a little food for thought.

The airline industry is in the midst of a record-breaking winter crisis, with thousands stranded around Christmas time. As if it wasn’t enough that flights were canceled on top days like Christmas Eve and Christmas day there have been over 1,700 US flights canceled because there are too many employees with positive Covid tests.

(CNN Business) Major US airlines canceled hundreds of more flights Sunday, the third day in a row of mass cancellations and delays over Christmas weekend, as staff and crew call out sick amid the Omicron surge.

This comes on the heels of several airline CEOs telling congress they don’t think masks “add anything” to the safety of flying.

The Airline CEOs were testifying to Congress about how they spent the Covid money they received during the pandemic. They made headlines by questioning the effectiveness of masks on airlines with the results of a study done on mannequins.

According to Forbes.com, the studies the CEOs had referenced were “done with mannequins who were sitting straight forward with masks on, not removing them, not eating at any point in time,” Nelson said. “So it is important to recognize that the safe controlled environment on the plane is a layered safety protocol, which includes the sanitation of the aircraft and includes the service procedures and includes the HEPA filtration that is not on all aircraft, by the way, and it includes everyone wearing the masks.”

Interestingly enough, the CEO of Southwest Airlines Gary Kelly tested positive with Covid-19 two days after appearing at the hearing maskless. He is fully vaccinated, boosted, and still contracted Covid. He didn’t make an informed decision. Don’t be like Gary. Listen to the scientist and the data.

Can face masks help slow the spread of the coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) that causes COVID-19? Yes. Face masks combined with other preventive measures, such as getting vaccinated, frequent hand-washing, and physical distancing, can help slow the spread of the virus.

Mayo Clinic

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

gts:
Job Title: Waiter/Waitress — Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

Organization: Mada Hotels

Duty Station: Jinja, Uganda

Mada Hotels Profile

Founded in 1982, Mada Hotels is one of East Africa’s leading hospitality service providers with properties spread throughout East Africa. Adventures Aloft Balloon Safaris is part of Mada services and offers Africa’s most famous game reserves including the Masai Mara, Serengeti and Tarangire National Park. They opened a new property in Namanve, Mukono called Kampala Nile Resort.

Job Summary

Waiters assist restaurant patrons by noting their order, serving tables their requested meals, and preparing bills at the end of the table’s meal. Waiters are also responsible for asking customers if they are satisfied with their meal and providing any assistance should the customer not be satisfied.

To be successful as a waiter you must have the endurance to stand for long hours and have patience with difficult customers. A good waiter anticipates the needs of customers and provides all services in a friendly manner.

Roles and Responsibilities:

- Greet customers and hand out menus.



- Take meal and beverage orders from customers and place these orders in the kitchen.



- Make menu recommendations and inform patrons of any specials.



- Deliver meals and beverages to tables when they have been prepared.



- Check that customers are satisfied with their meal.



- Prepare the bill for tables when requested.



- Cash up bills and ensure that the correct amount has been paid.



- Administer change to tables if needed.

Minimum Qualifications

- The applicant for the Mada Hotels Waiter/Waitress job should hold relevant qualifications



- Experience in the hospitality industry is required

How To Apply for Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

All candidates who wish to join the Mada Hotels in this capacity should Email a complete CV and cover letter to: fnbjnr@madahotels.com Or deliver physical copies to Jinja Nile Resort, Kimaka Road, Jinja, Uganda

Deadline: 25th December 2021

For similar Jobs in Uganda today and great Uganda jobs, please remember to subscribe using the form below:

NOTE:

No employer should ask you for money in return for advancement in the recruitment process or for being offered a position. Please contact Fresher Jobs Uganda if it ever happens with any of the jobs that we advertise.

Facebook



WhatsApp



Twitter

### Summary of Prosecco Producers Adopting the Rive Sub-Appellation

The study examines how Prosecco producers in the Rive sub-appellation have adopted this designation, highlighting the main factors that influenced their decision and the broader market impact. The Rive sub-appellation, recognized by UNESCO, has been instrumental in supporting wine tourism in the region. This recognition has not only enhanced the reputation of Prosecco but also provided a framework for producers to differentiate their products and tap into niche markets.

#### Main Factors Influencing Decision

1. **Market Demand**: Producers observed a growing demand for Prosecco with a specific sub-appellation designation, indicating a premium market segment. This demand was a key driver for adopting the Rive sub-appellation.

2. **Quality Control**: The Rive sub-appellation offers strict quality control measures, ensuring that only the best-quality Prosecco wines are produced. This has led to an increase in the perceived value of the wines, attracting both local and international consumers.

3. **Tourism and Branding**: The UNESCO recognition has significantly boosted tourism in the region. Producers have leveraged this opportunity to create unique experiences and brand their wines as part of a cultural heritage. This has not only increased sales but also enhanced the overall appeal of the region.

4. **Sustainability Practices**: Many producers have adopted sustainable farming practices to meet the requirements of the Rive sub-appellation. This not only helps in preserving the environment but also appeals to environmentally conscious consumers.

#### Market Impact

The adoption of the Rive sub-appellation has had a positive impact on the Prosecco market. It has led to an increase in sales, particularly among younger and more affluent consumers who are willing to pay a premium for wines with a specific sub-appellation. The recognition has also facilitated the development of niche markets, such as those catering to specific dietary preferences or health-conscious consumers.

In conclusion, the Rive sub-appellation has been a strategic choice for Prosecco producers, offering a combination of quality assurance, market differentiation, and cultural heritage. This recognition has not only boosted the local economy but also positioned Prosecco as a premium product in the global market.
</response>
gts:
How do sparkling wine producers adopt a sub-appellation? Evidence from an exploratory study on heroic Prosecco Superiore Rive

Luigino Barisan, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

Luigi Galletto, University of Padua, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

This paper investigates why wineries producing Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Protected Denomination of Origin (CVPP) wines decided to adopt the sub-appellation (SA) “Rive” as a way to increase the value of their wines.

We estimated both a logistic and a linear regression to explain Rive SA firms’ choices and market growth drivers, respectively. By using data gathered from CVPP producers, we divided wineries into two groups, those that have adopted the Rive SA and those that have not. By means of a stepwise procedure, we categorized factors that were likely to explain the Rive SA choice within a set of structural, marketing and wine tourism-related variables.

The results showed that structural drivers such as the human capital of younger producers, pressure tank sizes, competitive positioning in the market and in the field of wine tourism hospitality, and involvement in ad hoc promotional activities (i.e., Primavera del Prosecco) have the greatest effects on the choice of the Rive SA. The synergistic effects of cellar door sales, small firm sizes and specific foreign markets (i.e., the United Kingdom and the United States) have emerged, on the other hand, as vital factors in the growth of the Rive SA in terms of market share.

The adoption of the Rive SA may play an important role in supporting and valuing the heroic viticulture-based economy and may help the CVPP Tutelary Consortium to appropriately undertake promotional strategies to differentiate wines and improve competitiveness. This could have positive effects on wine tourism, hospitality and winery visits in light of the recent recognition of the CVPP as the 55th Italian UNESCO World Heritage site.

Here’s a concise article on public speaking for beginners, including practical examples for each step:

### Four Steps to Public Speaking for Beginners

#### Step 1: Brainstorming
Before you start writing your speech, it’s important to gather your thoughts and ideas. Here are some practical tips to help you brainstorm effectively:

1. **Identify Your Purpose**: What do you want to achieve with your speech? Are you trying to inform, persuade, or entertain your audience? Understanding your purpose will help you focus your ideas.
2. **Research Your Topic**: Dive into your subject matter to find interesting facts, statistics, and anecdotes. This will make your speech more engaging and credible.
3. **List Your Ideas**: Write down everything that comes to mind related to your topic. Don’t worry about organizing it yet; just get all your ideas on paper. You can sort and refine them later.
4. **Create an Outline**: Once you have a list of ideas, organize them into a logical structure. This will help you structure your speech and ensure that your points flow smoothly.

#### Step 2: Speech Writing
Now that you have your ideas, it’s time to start writing your speech. Here are some practical tips to help you structure your speech:

1. **Introduction**: Start with a hook to grab your audience’s attention. This could be a surprising fact, a question, or a personal anecdote. Introduce your topic and state your main point.
2. **Body Paragraphs**: Each paragraph should focus on a single idea or point. Use clear and concise language to explain your point. Include supporting details and examples to make your speech more engaging.
3. **Transition Words**: Use transition words and phrases to connect your ideas and make your speech flow smoothly. Words like “firstly,” “secondly,” and “finally” can help you organize your thoughts and keep your audience engaged.
4. **Conclusion**: Summarize your main points and restate your main idea. End with a strong closing statement that leaves a lasting impression on your audience. You can also include a call to action or a question to encourage discussion.

#### Step 3: Practicing
Once you have your speech written, it’s time to practice. Here are some practical tips to help you prepare:

1. **Rehearse in Front of a Mirror**: Stand in front of a mirror and practice your speech. This will help you get comfortable with your body language and make any necessary adjustments.
2. **Record Yourself**: Record your speech and listen to it back. This will help you identify areas where you need to improve and make any necessary changes.
3. **Practice in Front of a Friend or Family Member**: Find someone who can give you feedback on your speech. Ask them to listen to you and provide constructive criticism.
4. **Use Visual Aids**: If possible, use visual aids like slides or props to help you deliver your speech. This will make your presentation more engaging and memorable.

#### Step 4: Visualization
Visualization is a powerful tool that can help you feel more confident and prepared for your speech. Here are some practical tips to help you visualize success:

1. **Imagine Your Audience**: Visualize your audience as a friendly group of people who are interested in what you have to say. Imagine them nodding their heads and smiling at you.
2. **Picture Your Success**: Imagine yourself delivering your speech with confidence and ease. Visualize your audience listening intently and responding positively to your message.
3. **Use Positive Affirmations**: Repeat positive affirmations to yourself before your speech. For example, “I am prepared and confident,” or “I will deliver a great speech.”
4. **Stay Focused**: During your speech, stay focused on your message and your audience. Visualize yourself delivering your speech with clarity and passion.

By following these four steps, you can become a more confident and effective public speaker. Remember to practice regularly and stay positive. Good luck!
</response>

In the beginning, the first thing you must do is to write down topics you want to focus on in bullet points with one or two sentences.

Startup with a curious fact, a Dramatic question, a quote, or a Story.

Be positive.

Make it short. Around 20 minutes.

The audience must know the problem and the proposed solution by the end.

Summarize before you finish.

Follow up with a motivating or inspiring finish.

Step 3: Practicing

The target is being natural while speaking. An occasional glance at your notes should be enough to remember. Here are some tips for practicing:

Practice in front of a mirror a few times. Get feedback from a friend.

Audiences are eager to hear what you have to say. So be clear and prompt.

Relevant gestures, occasional movement, and eye contact are very impactful. So use them often.

Keep your notes on the podium, and walk around.

Step 4: Visualize

Visualization of your topic and related things can be a very powerful thing if you do it right. Use PowerPoint presentations, photos, charts, and videos to make your point.

Here’s a concise article on the Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule in cricket, focusing on the 2003 World Cup incident between South Africa and Sri Lanka, including Hariprasath’s critique of the rule’s complexity:

### The Duckworth-Lewis Rule: A Critical Analysis

The Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule is a method used in cricket to determine the winner of a match when the game is interrupted before the completion of the scheduled number of overs. This rule was introduced in 1997 to address the issue of uneven competition between teams with different resources, such as playing conditions and player availability. However, its implementation has been subject to criticism, particularly regarding its complexity and fairness.

#### Basics of the D/L Rule

The D/L rule is based on the concept of "theoretical runs" that a team would have scored if the game had continued. It takes into account the number of overs remaining, the number of wickets lost, and the current score to calculate the target for the team batting second. The rule aims to ensure that the team batting second has a fair chance of winning, regardless of the circumstances that led to the interruption.

#### The 1992 World Cup Incident

The 1992 World Cup is often cited as a pivotal moment in the history of the D/L rule. In the final match between Australia and England, the game was interrupted due to rain, and the D/L rule was applied to determine the winner. The incident highlighted the rule's potential for creating unfair outcomes. Specifically, England was given a target of 22 runs off just 1 ball, which was deemed unrealistic and unfair by many. This incident led to widespread criticism of the D/L rule and its implementation.

#### The 2003 World Cup Controversy

The 2003 World Cup saw another instance where the D/L rule came under scrutiny. In the semi-final match between South Africa and Sri Lanka, the game was interrupted due to rain, and the D/L rule was applied. The key incident was the dropped single by Mark Boucher, a South African batsman. Boucher was attempting to score a run off the final ball of the innings, but the ball was dropped by the fielding team. This dropped single led to Sri Lanka being given a target of 12 runs off just 1 ball, which was again seen as an unfair and unrealistic target.

#### Hariprasath’s Critique

Hariprasath, a cricket analyst, has frequently critiqued the D/L rule for its complexity and potential for creating unfair outcomes. He argues that the rule is overly complicated and can lead to situations where the team batting second is given an unfair advantage. For example, the D/L rule can result in teams being given targets that are not only unrealistic but also potentially dangerous for the batting side. This can lead to situations where the team batting second is forced to play defensively, which can be detrimental to their performance.

#### Conclusion

The D/L rule has been a controversial aspect of cricket, particularly in the context of its application during interruptions. The 1992 World Cup incident and the 2003 World Cup controversy highlight the rule's potential for creating unfair outcomes. Hariprasath’s critique of the rule’s complexity further emphasizes the need for a simpler and more fair method of determining the winner of interrupted matches. While the D/L rule has its merits, its implementation can be improved to ensure that it does not lead to situations where the team batting second is given an unfair advantage.

By Hariprasath

Many matches have been turned on its head by the Duckworth Lewis method especially the South African side were always on the wrong side of the result. Even the cricket pundits had difficulty in grasping this rule. The complexity of this rule has led to many controversies, and the difficulty involved in calculating the appropriate score in the rain-affected matches has led to many chaotic situations.

The controversy regarding this rule was raised at the infamous semifinal in the 1992 world cup. South Africa's side was on the verge of victory before the rain interrupted. South Africa needed 22 of 13 to win before rain interrupted. Ten minutes later, the South African side was informed that they need to score 22 of 1 ball, and this incident raised all sorts of heated discussion on the Duckworth Lewis rule.

In the version of D/L most commonly in use in international and first-class matches (the ‘Professional Edition’), the target for Team 2 is adjusted simply in proportion to the two teams’ resources, i.e.,

For example, if a rain delay means that Team 2 only has 70% of resources available, and Team 1 scored 220 with 100% of resources available, then 220 × 70% / 100% = 154, so Team 2’s target is 154, and the score to tie is 153. The actual resource values used in the Professional Edition are not publicly available, so a computer that has this software loaded must be used.

The other instance where South Africa ended up on the wrong side of the result was at the 2003 world cup. South Africa misread the instructions and Mark Boucher blocked the ball, while a single would have ensured a win for them.

Here’s a concise article on ‘Accounts from Incomplete Records’ in under 500 words:

### Accounts from Incomplete Records

Accounts from incomplete records refer to financial records that are not fully detailed or complete. This can occur due to various reasons such as errors in recording, missing data, or incomplete transactions. Incomplete records can make it challenging to accurately assess the financial health of an entity, as there may be gaps in the data that prevent a complete picture.

#### Why It’s Used

In situations where full records are not available, accounts from incomplete records are often used as a substitute. This approach helps in providing a basic understanding of the financial situation, even if it’s not as comprehensive as complete records. For example, a company might use accounts from incomplete records to meet regulatory requirements or to provide a preliminary report to stakeholders.

#### Comparison to the Double-Entry System

The double-entry system is a more rigorous method of accounting where every transaction is recorded in two accounts: one as a debit and one as a credit. This ensures that the accounting equation (Assets = Liabilities + Equity) remains balanced. The double-entry system is considered more accurate and reliable than accounts from incomplete records because it provides a more complete and balanced view of financial transactions.

However, the double-entry system is not always feasible or practical, especially in situations where records are incomplete or where the system is not well-established. In such cases, accounts from incomplete records can serve as a useful alternative.

### Conclusion

Accounts from incomplete records are a necessary tool when full records are not available. While they provide a basic understanding of the financial situation, they should be used with caution and in conjunction with other methods to ensure a more comprehensive and accurate assessment of a company’s financial health. For a more detailed and reliable analysis, the double-entry system is generally preferred.

---

If you have any further questions or need more information, feel free to ask!
</response>
gts:
Accounting records, which aren’t strictly kept consistent with the double-entry bookkeeping system are referred to as Accounts from incomplete records. Many authors describe it as a single entry system.

However, a single-entry bookkeeping system may be a misnomer because there’s no such system for maintaining accounting records. It is also not a ‘shortcut’ method as an alternate to the double-entry bookkeeping system. It is rather a mechanism of maintaining records whereby some transactions are recorded with proper debits and credits while just in the case of others, either one-sided or no entry is formed.

Accounts from Incomplete Records

Normally, under this technique records of money and private accounts of debtors and creditors are properly maintained, while the knowledge concerning assets, liabilities, expenses and revenues is partially recorded. Hence, these are usually referred to as accounts from incomplete records.

For more details please visit:https://www.manishco.com/accounts-from-incomplete-records/

In today’s competitive business landscape, a well-designed logo can make all the difference. Before diving into the software, let’s understand why logos are crucial. A logo is the face of your brand. It’s the first thing people see when they encounter your business, and it sets the tone for their initial impression. A good logo can:

- **Enhance Brand Recall**: A memorable logo is easier to recall, which can lead to better brand recognition.
- **Build Trust and Credibility**: A well-designed logo can convey professionalism and reliability.
- **Facilitate Branding Across Channels**: A consistent logo across all marketing materials helps maintain brand consistency.

### How Logobiz and Logomart Work

Logobiz and Logomart are two popular logo design software options. Both offer a range of features to help you create a professional logo. Here’s a brief overview of how they work:

Here’s a direct answer with a targeted follow-up question to address the mental side and specific travel strategies:

### Article on Finding Good Places to Warm Up as a Singer or Speaker

**Physical Strategies:**
1. **Warm-Up Workshops:** Attend local workshops or classes where you can practice in a supportive environment.
2. **YouTube Tutorials:** Watch professional singers and speakers warm up in public spaces to get ideas and inspiration.
3. **Community Spaces:** Look for community centers or libraries that offer practice rooms or soundproof booths.
4. **Online Platforms:** Use platforms like YouTube or social media to find local singers or speakers who are open to sharing their spaces.

**Mental Strategies:**
1. **Visualization:** Imagine yourself performing in front of an audience and succeed. Visualize the positive outcomes of your practice.
2. **Positive Affirmations:** Repeat positive affirmations to boost your confidence, such as "I am prepared" or "I am capable."
3. **Mindfulness:** Practice mindfulness techniques to stay present and focused during your warm-ups. This can help reduce anxiety and improve your performance.
4. **Breathing Exercises:** Use deep breathing techniques to calm your nerves and center yourself before performing.

**Travel Strategies:**
1. **Hotel Rooms:** If you’re traveling and need a private practice space, look for hotels that offer soundproof rooms or have a quiet area designated for guests.
2. **Airbnb:** Consider booking an Airbnb that offers a private practice room or a quiet space for your warm-ups.
3. **Local Venues:** Check if there are local venues or rehearsal spaces that are open to the public and offer a private practice area.
4. **Community Events:** Attend community events or open mic nights where you can practice in a supportive environment without the pressure of a full audience.

### Follow-Up Question:
Would you like more detailed tips on any of these strategies, or are there specific areas you’d like to focus on?

Feel free to let me know if you have any other questions!
</response>
gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited…staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material…that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say…don’t be shy to be warming up your voice. It’s part of the preparation and it’s what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking…oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares…you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It’s not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it’s better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10–20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

gts:
Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman’s career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager — the career-long Mariner is “unbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.”

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs — career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!
